attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition that Joanna Lumley be given a MBE for her Support for the rights of the Gurkhas to be able to live in the UK. She has been so passionate about these men who have honoured the Queen and have fought and in circumstances died for the Queen and Country. I would also like to thank Gordon Brown for his support and descion.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
